messages.subject: Unschooling Carnival
messages.msgSnippet:
Just sending a reminder that submissions for the next Unschooling Voices
unschooling carnival are still open!  I d really like to hear from
*seasoned*
messages.messageBody:
Just sending a reminder that submissions for the next Unschooling Voices
unschooling carnival are still open! I'd really like to hear from
*seasoned* unschoolers on the topic of math... and how you live it.

Click here for more information about the carnival and how to submit to it.

http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

Thanks!

Lesa
http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
